author: wtopstaff
title: Hornets-Heat, Box
text:
By The Associated Press October 4, 2015 8:35 pm CHARLOTTE (90) 
Hairston 1-7 2-3 4, M.Williams 1-4 2-2 4, Zeller 3-3 0-0 8, Walker 4-11 6-7 17, Lamb 2-11 4-4 8, Hansbrough 1-4 2-4 4, Kaminsky 3-11 0-0 9, Lin 3-7 4-5 10, Roberts 6-11 6-6 21, Harrison 1-3 0-0 3, Washburn 0-0 0-0 0, Thompson 1-2 0-0 2. Totals 26-74 26-31 90. MIAMI (77) 
Deng 3-7 1-1 7, Bosh 6-11 2-3 14, Haslem 0-0 0-0 0, Dragic 1-3 0-0 2, Wade 5-11 2-3 12, Green 5-14 1-1 12, McRoberts 2-5 0-0 5, Stoudemire 5-11 2-2 12, Chalmers 1-3 0-0 3, Winslow 2-9 5-8 9, Andersen 0-1 0-0 0, Johnson 0-1 1-2 1, Whittington 0-3 0-0 0, Richardson 0-2 0-0 0. Totals 30-81 14-20 77. Charlotte 26 23 20 21—90 Miami 22 24 17 14—77 
3-Point Goals_Charlotte 12-29 (Roberts 3-4, Walker 3-4, Kaminsky 3-5, Zeller 2-2, Harrison 1-1, M.Williams 0-2, Lin 0-2, Lamb 0-4, Hairston 0-5), Miami 3-16 (Chalmers 1-2, McRoberts 1-3, Green 1-4, Bosh 0-1, Andersen 0-1, Whittington 0-1, Deng 0-1, Winslow 0-3). Fouled Out_None. Rebounds_Charlotte 61 (Hansbrough 17), Miami 49 (Bosh 7). Assists_Charlotte 13 (Roberts, Kaminsky 3), Miami 19 (Dragic 6). Total Fouls_Charlotte 19, Miami 24. A_19,600 (19,600).
